name: FoodSecurity
title: Food Security
description: Determination of whether and degree to which the person experiences limited or uncertain availability of nutritionally adequate and safe foods or limited or uncertain ability to acquire acceptable foods in socially acceptable ways. (Business ID: Entry 3266407)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Food Security.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of whether and degree to which the person experiences limited or uncertain availability of nutritionally adequate and safe foods or limited or uncertain ability to acquire acceptable foods in socially acceptable ways..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Food Security.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Food Security.)

contains.display: Food security (finding)
Nutrition impaired due to limited access to healthful foods (finding)
Insufficient food supply (finding)
Food insecurity (finding)
How often in the past 12 months would you say the patient was worried or stressed about having enough money to buy nutritious meals [BRFSS]
Hunger Vital Sign [HVS]
Within the past 12 months we worried whether our food would run out before we got money to buy more [U.S. FSS]
Within the past 12 months the food we bought just didn't last and we didn't have money to get more [U.S. FSS]
Food insecurity risk [HVS]
Have you or any family members you live with been unable to get any of the following when it was really needed in past 1 year [PRAPARE]
Did you or others you live with eat smaller meals or skip meals because you didn't have money for food in the past 2 months [WellRx]
U.S. Household Food Security Survey [U.S. FSS]
